title: CadaNews
author: CadaNews
content: We have compiled a list of the best Bitcoin wallets: https://www.cada.news/best-bitcoin-wallets/ (13), including hardware wallets, browser extensions, Android, iOS... We also briefly explained the difference between hot and cold wallets, the types of Bitcoin wallets, and more.Since our website features the best wallets for all blockchains and BTC is the major cryptocurrency with the biggest market cap, we would like to get feedback from the community.Thank you

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: What are the criteria on which you based the classification? I can understand that referral links are the reason for the classification of hardware wallets, but many of the other options are very poor, or at least they were chosen randomly without explanation of the advantages or disadvantages or personal use experience. Bitpay, trust wallet and others, without even mentioning the good open source wallets. Ivankovac[1] is the one who wrote this article. I suggest that you contact him to create an account here, or try to find more than one writer, as some on the forum may help you improve the quality of posts for a small fee.[1] https://www.cada.news/author/ivankovac/

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: CadaNews on September 08, 2023, 01:31:32 PMSince our website features the best wallets for all blockchains and BTC is the major cryptocurrency with the biggest market cap, we would like to get feedback from the community.Unfortunately, you provide incomplete and outdated information about your so-called best Bitcoin wallets you did not mention Exodus as a close source wallet and you include Atomic wallet when it has very weak security because it was hacked just two months ago Atomic Wallet faces lawsuit over $100M crypto hack losses: Report And may I ask why Electrum has not been added to the list of your best?I like to call your list the best Bitcoin wallets according to your opinion because there's a wallet that should be included there's a wallet that should not be included and there's a wallet that is questionable.
